p: Picornaviruses are small non-enveloped RNA viruses responsible for a very wide variety of diseases including the common cold which is caused by rhinoviruses. However, picarnoviruses are also responsible for countless devastating epidemics, such as poliomyelitis caused by polioviruses, and hand, foot and mouth disease commonly caused by coxsackievirus A16 or enterovirus 71 (EV71) [ 26, 27].
